DOC.HEADLINE: NATION IN BRIEF ; NEW YORK ; U.S. SEIZES HOTEL PLAGUED BY CRIME
DOC.TEXT: New York City ' s largest rooming house was seized by the federal_government in a bid to end drug dealing and murders there.Shortly before the 621-room Kenmore Hotel was seized , eight rooms were searched for drugs and 18 people were arrested , police said . The hotel houses a large_number of people who rely_on government aid , and it will continue to operate under the direction of a management company , officials said . The hotel ' s hotel , Tran Dinh Truong , is not charged with any crime .
